com.aastorp.bibliothecaaastorpiana.layouts

Class MagicGridLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.GridLayout
      • com.aastorp.bibliothecaaastorpiana.layouts.MagicGridLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.LayoutManager, java.io.Serializable

    public class MagicGridLayout
extends java.awt.GridLayout
    A GridLayout that automagically manages its columns and rows to attempt to fit all Components on the screen in as little space as possible.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • autoResize

        public void autoResize(java.awt.Container c)
        Automatically resize the entire window based on the amount of components and the automatically calculated columns / rows.

      • autoResize

        public void autoResize(java.awt.Container c,
                       boolean resizeWindow)
        Automatically resize the entire window based on the amount of components and the automatically calculated columns / rows.
        Parameters:
        c - The container to resize.
        resizeWindow - Whether or not to resize the Window, ie. the SwingUtilities.getWindowAncestor(Component) of the MagicGridLayout's container.

      • calculateBestColumnCount

        protected int calculateBestColumnCount(java.awt.Container c)
        Calculates the "best" amount of columns to use to display the Components in this MagicGridLayout. Defaults to 1.
        Returns:
        The new column count.
